translations: [数]替换（substitution 的复数）；代替；代用

phrs.translation: 取代度；饱和度；代换的次数

sentences.sentence: Two substitutions were made during the game.
Substitutions of one gesture for the other often create not only humorous but also embarrassing moments.
sentences.translation: 用一种手势替换另一种往往不仅仅会创造幽默，也会产生尴尬的时刻。

sentences.sentence: All I've done make these substitutions here.
